languages.text: "Предпочитаете лучше понимать, с кем путешествуете? Разумно". {n}Соломон смотрит на вас долгим внимательным взглядом.{/n} "Спрашивайте".
"You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."
languages.original_text: "Предпочитаете лучше понимать, с кем путешествуете? Разумно". {n}Соломон смотрит на вас долгим внимательным взглядом.{/n} "Спрашивайте".

traits.locale_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? Makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

"You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

languages.text: 「同行する相手のことを、よく理解しておきたいということですか？理にかなっていますね」{n}ソロモーンはじっと、観察するような視線をあなたに向けた。{/n}「質問をどうぞ」
languages.original_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

traits.locale_text: 「同行する相手のことを、よく理解しておきたいということですか？理にかなっていますね」{n}ソロモーンはじっと、観察するような視線をあなたに向けた。{/n}「質問をどうぞ」

languages.text: "Ihr wollt die Personen besser verstehen, mit denen Ihr reist? Das ist sinnvoll." {n}Solomorne mustert dich lange.{/n} "Fragt."
languages.original_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt die Personen besser verstehen, mit denen Ihr reist? Das ist sinnvoll." {n}Solomorne mustert dich lange.{/n} "Fragt."

languages.text: « Vous tenez à en apprendre davantage sur vos compagnons de voyage ? C'est compréhensible, {n}répond Solomorne en vous étudiant attentivement.{/n} Posez-moi vos questions. »
languages.original_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

traits.locale_text: « Vous tenez à en apprendre davantage sur vos compagnons de voyage ? C'est compréhensible, {n}répond Solomorne en vous étudiant attentivement.{/n} Posez-moi vos questions. »

languages.text: «¿Quiere conocer mejor a la gente con la que viaja? Tiene sentido». {n}Solomorne te escudriña atentamente.{/n} «Pregunte».
languages.original_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere conocer mejor a la gente con la que viaja? Tiene sentido». {n}Solomorne te escudriña atentamente.{/n} «Pregunte».

languages.text: “你希望进一步了解与你同行的人吗？这是合理的做法。”{n}索罗蒙带着探究的目光打量着你。{/n}“问吧。”
languages.original_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

traits.locale_text: “你希望进一步了解与你同行的人吗？这是合理的做法。”{n}索罗蒙带着探究的目光打量着你。{/n}“问吧。”

languages.text: "Birlikte seyahat ettiğiniz insanları daha yakından tanımak istiyorsunuz demek. Çok mantıklı." {n}Solomorne seni uzun bir bakışla inceliyor.{/n} "Buyurun."
languages.original_text: "You prefer to have a better understanding of the people you travel with? That makes sense." {n}Solomorne gives you a long, studying look.{/n} "Ask."

traits.locale_text: "Birlikte seyahat ettiğiniz insanları daha yakından tanımak istiyorsunuz demek. Çok mantıklı." {n}Solomorne seni uzun bir bakışla inceliyor.{/n} "Buyurun."
